revised_title: The Impact of Ultra-Violet Sunlight on the Upper Atmosphere
tldr: The author discusses the effects of ultra-violet sunlight on the upper atmosphere, including ionization, ozone formation, and aurora phenomena. They argue that these effects are primarily due to the action of ultra-violet sunlight and provide evidence from various sources, such as solar spectrum analysis and observations of the night sky spectrum.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
